name: Sherlock: A Rose Among Thorns
storyline:
As an aspiring investigative journalist, your world is shaken when your closest friend, Charlotte, is kidnapped, leaving behind only a haunting red rose—the hallmark of the infamous Roseblood Killer.

Driven by determination, you join forces with the legendary Sherlock Holmes and his steadfast ally, Dr. John Watson. Together, you'll scour crime scenes, decipher cryptic clues, and confront pivotal choices that will shape the course of your investigation. But beware, as you delve deeper, you may become entangled in a web of deception spun by the nefarious criminal mastermind, James Moriarty, and the handsome philanthropist, Lord Sebastian Blackwood.

Uncover the secrets shrouding your own past and unearth the chilling connection to the elusive killer. Can you, alongside Holmes and Watson, outwit the murderer and navigate the labyrinth of your intertwined hearts? Or will the shadows of the past consume you, casting doubt on your quest for justice and love in a city gripped by darkness?
summary: Step into Victorian-era London and join Sherlock Holmes' detective agency on a thrilling quest to unravel the mystery behind a series of chilling murders that grip the city.
